meaningMnemonic: When you go in <kanji>order</kanji> of <kanji>turn</kanji>s that's the <vocabulary>order</vocabulary>. It also represents <vocabulary>one's turn</vocabulary> in said order as well.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
